snippet: Roger Federer said 'time was ticking' in his battle to recover form and fitness for the French Open after he lost to rising Austrian Dominic Thiem 7-6(2) 6-4 in the third round of the Italian Open on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer said 'time was ticking' in his battle to recover form and fitness for the French Open after he lost to rising Austrian Dominic Thiem 7-6(2) 6-4 in the third round of the Italian Open on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Federer Out, Serena Overcomes Dog-Food Illness
headline.main: Federer Out, Serena Overcomes Dog-Food Illness
